events.title: Annual Family Reunion 2024
events.description: Our biggest family gathering of the year! Three generations came together to celebrate our heritage, share stories, and create new memories. The event featured traditional games, a family talent show, and a delicious potluck dinner.

events.title: Golden Wedding Anniversary
events.description: Celebrating 50 years of love and togetherness. A magnificent celebration honoring the founding couple of our family tree.

events.title: Christmas Family Gathering 2024
events.description: The whole family comes together for our annual Christmas celebration with gift exchange, carol singing, and festive dinner.

events.title: New Year Celebration 2025
events.description: Ring in the new year with the whole family! Join us for an evening of reflection, celebration, and hope for the year ahead.

events.title: Summer Family Picnic 2025
events.description: Annual summer picnic at the national park. Fun activities for kids, barbecue lunch, and quality family time in nature.

events.title: Grandpa's 80th Birthday
events.description: A grand celebration for our beloved patriarch's 80th birthday. Join us for a day of honoring his legacy and creating new memories.
